properties.name: Client Secret Which has SXO Role and Permission
APIs EndPoints for Categories and ChangeOwners

properties.description:
This automation execute the API using OLD SX token and all apis execution should fail with 401 error. 

Select Custom Automation API target or Select Custom Securex Internal Target to run this automation. 

Custom Automation API Target Host -- automate.int.iroh.site and Account Keys are not Required 

Custom Securex Internal API Target Host -- securex-ao.int.iroh.site and Account Keys are not Required
